[Python]Read and Write CSV file

January 8, 2018 0 Comments Python 
import csv

# read csv file
with open("file.csv", "rb") as f:
    for row in csv.reader(f):
        print row
    



# write csv file
data = [["data1", "data2"], ["data3", "data4"]]  # list 
with open("file.csv", "wb") as f:
    w = csv.writer(f)
    w.writerows(data)
